title: Remove the Share option button from the header (no other changes)

requirements.text: Remove the Share option UI control rendered in the app header (the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger button) and keep the rest of the header layout/behavior unchanged.

quotes: Remove only the share option,change nothing else,everything same except the share optipn

acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders the ShareWebsiteDialog trigger/button (i.e., no share icon/button/menu entry is visible in the header).
All other header elements remain the same (logo/home button, navigation items, login/logout button, and mobile menu button still function as before).

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected header element context (share option in the header) and do not modify unrelated UI or flows.
nonGoals: Do not change the Footer share option.
Do not modify ShareWebsiteDialog behavior or content beyond removing its header trigger.
Do not change authentication, navigation, or styling/theme elsewhere.
